languages.text: "Узрите, как сии буйные и беспощадные воители сойдутся в смертной схватке на потеху вам, простому люду! Участвовать имеет право каждый, победителям в поединках будет дарована привилегия стать рядовыми в страже династии фон Валанциус! Веселитесь и славьте Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] В качестве жеста доброй воли Вольный торговец наказал устроить вам зрелище! Лучшие гладиаторы будут биться на потеху толпе!

languages.text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"
languages.original_text: "Узрите, как сии буйные и беспощадные воители сойдутся в смертной схватке на потеху вам, простому люду! Участвовать имеет право каждый, победителям в поединках будет дарована привилегия стать рядовыми в страже династии фон Валанциус! Веселитесь и славьте Вольного Торговца!"

traits.locale_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius guard! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

"Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius guard! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius guard! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius guard! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

"Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

languages.text: “看看这些狂野、凶悍的战士是如何生死相搏的吧！善良的人们啊，这一切都是为了娱乐大众！所有人都可以参加这场角斗，角斗的获胜方将有权成为冯·瓦兰修斯卫队的列兵！欢呼吧，赞颂行商浪人的威名吧！”
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: “看看这些狂野、凶悍的战士是如何生死相搏的吧！善良的人们啊，这一切都是为了娱乐大众！所有人都可以参加这场角斗，角斗的获胜方将有权成为冯·瓦兰修斯卫队的列兵！欢呼吧，赞颂行商浪人的威名吧！”

languages.text: «Contemplen a estos salvajes y despiadados guerreros luchar en combates a muerte, ¡todo para su diversión! ¡Todo el mundo puede participar y se recompensará a los ganadores con la oportunidad de entrar a las filas de los guardias de la dinastía von Valancius! ¡Alabado sea el nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: «Contemplen a estos salvajes y despiadados guerreros luchar en combates a muerte, ¡todo para su diversión! ¡Todo el mundo puede participar y se recompensará a los ganadores con la oportunidad de entrar a las filas de los guardias de la dinastía von Valancius! ¡Alabado sea el nombre de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente!».

languages.text: 「獣のごとく容赦なき戦士達がぶつかり合う死闘をその目に焼き付けよ…すべては、楽しみのためにあるのだ、善き人々よ！参加は誰にでも許されており、戦いの勝者には、フォン・ヴァランシウス様の私兵となる特権が与えられる！喜びとともに、自由開拓者の名を讃えよ！」
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: 「獣のごとく容赦なき戦士達がぶつかり合う死闘をその目に焼き付けよ…すべては、楽しみのためにあるのだ、善き人々よ！参加は誰にでも許されており、戦いの勝者には、フォン・ヴァランシウス様の私兵となる特権が与えられる！喜びとともに、自由開拓者の名を讃えよ！」

languages.text: "Werdet Zeugen, wie diese wilden und gnadenlosen Krieger einander bis zum Tode bekämpfen – zu Eurer Unterhaltung, gute Leute! Jeder darf teilnehmen, und die Sieger dieser Gefechte erhalten das Privileg, Gefreite bei den Wächtern derer von Valancius zu werden! Freut Euch und preiset den Namen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}!"
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: "Werdet Zeugen, wie diese wilden und gnadenlosen Krieger einander bis zum Tode bekämpfen – zu Eurer Unterhaltung, gute Leute! Jeder darf teilnehmen, und die Sieger dieser Gefechte erhalten das Privileg, Gefreite bei den Wächtern derer von Valancius zu werden! Freut Euch und preiset den Namen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}!"

languages.text: « Regardez ces guerriers sauvages et sans merci s'affronter jusqu'à la mort pour vous divertir, bonnes gens ! Tout le monde peut participer et les vainqueurs de ces combats auront l'honneur d'intégrer la garde des von Valancius ! Réjouissez-vous et louez le nom {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: « Regardez ces guerriers sauvages et sans merci s'affronter jusqu'à la mort pour vous divertir, bonnes gens ! Tout le monde peut participer et les vainqueurs de ces combats auront l'honneur d'intégrer la garde des von Valancius ! Réjouissez-vous et louez le nom {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} ! »

languages.text: "Bu vahşi ve acımasız savaşçıların, sırf siz güzel insanlar eğlenebilsin diye birbiriyle ölümüne dövüşmesine şahit olun! Katılım herkese açık olup bu dövüşlerin kazananlarına, von Valancius muhafızlarının bir eri olma ayrıcalığı bahşedilecektir! Eğlenmenize bakın ve Hür Tacir'in adının şanına şan katın!"
languages.original_text: "Witness these wild and merciless warriors face each other in a fight to the death — all for your amusement, good folk! Anyone is allowed to participate, and the winners of these battles will be granted the privilege of becoming privates in the von Valancius wardens! Be merry and praise the Rogue Trader's name!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu vahşi ve acımasız savaşçıların, sırf siz güzel insanlar eğlenebilsin diye birbiriyle ölümüne dövüşmesine şahit olun! Katılım herkese açık olup bu dövüşlerin kazananlarına, von Valancius muhafızlarının bir eri olma ayrıcalığı bahşedilecektir! Eğlenmenize bakın ve Hür Tacir'in adının şanına şan katın!"
